description: Backend server starts successfully on specified port
steps: Step 1: Run init.sh to start backend server
Step 2: Verify server starts without errors
Step 3: Confirm server is listening on the correct port
Step 4: Check that database connection is established

description: Frontend server starts successfully on specified port
steps: Step 1: Run init.sh to start frontend server
Step 2: Verify frontend starts without errors
Step 3: Confirm frontend is accessible on specified port
Step 4: Check that the homepage loads

description: Database schema is created with all required tables
steps: Step 1: Start the backend server
Step 2: Check that users table exists with correct columns
Step 3: Verify all tables from schema are created (addresses, categories, products, etc.)
Step 4: Confirm foreign key relationships are properly set up

description: Sample product data is seeded into database
steps: Step 1: Start the backend server
Step 2: Query products table and verify it contains sample data
Step 3: Check that categories are populated
Step 4: Verify product images are associated with products
Step 5: Confirm brands table has sample data

description: User registration with email and password works
steps: Step 1: Navigate to registration page
Step 2: Fill in email, password, and name fields
Step 3: Submit registration form
Step 4: Verify user receives success message
Step 5: Check that user is created in database
Step 6: Confirm password is hashed in database

description: User login with valid credentials
steps: Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Enter registered email and password
Step 3: Submit login form
Step 4: Verify JWT token is received
Step 5: Confirm user is redirected to homepage
Step 6: Check that user account menu shows logged-in state

description: User login with invalid credentials fails appropriately
steps: Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Enter incorrect email or password
Step 3: Submit login form
Step 4: Verify error message is displayed
Step 5: Confirm user remains on login page

description: JWT token authentication protects API endpoints
steps: Step 1: Attempt to access protected endpoint without token
Step 2: Verify 401 unauthorized response
Step 3: Login and obtain valid token
Step 4: Access same endpoint with valid token
Step 5: Confirm request succeeds with 200 response

description: Remember me functionality persists login session
steps: Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Check 'Remember me' option
Step 3: Login with valid credentials
Step 4: Close browser and reopen
Step 5: Navigate to site
Step 6: Verify user is still logged in

description: Password reset flow sends reset email and allows password change
steps: Step 1: Navigate to forgot password page
Step 2: Enter registered email address
Step 3: Submit form
Step 4: Verify reset token is generated
Step 5: Navigate to reset link (mock email)
Step 6: Enter new password
Step 7: Submit and verify password is updated
Step 8: Login with new password successfully

description: Product listing page displays all products in grid view
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Verify products are displayed in grid layout
Step 3: Check that product cards show image, name, price, and rating
Step 4: Confirm add to cart button is visible on each card

description: Product listing can toggle between grid and list view
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page (default grid view)
Step 2: Click list view toggle button
Step 3: Verify layout changes to list view
Step 4: Click grid view toggle button
Step 5: Verify layout changes back to grid view

description: Product detail page displays complete product information
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click on a product card
Step 3: Verify product detail page loads with correct product
Step 4: Check that image gallery displays with thumbnails
Step 5: Verify product name, brand, description, and price are shown
Step 6: Confirm variant selectors (size, color) are present
Step 7: Check that stock availability indicator is displayed
Step 8: Verify add to cart button is present

description: Product image gallery allows viewing multiple images
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product detail page
Step 2: Verify main product image is displayed
Step 3: Click on thumbnail images
Step 4: Confirm main image updates to show selected thumbnail
Step 5: Test navigation arrows between images

description: Product image zoom functionality works on hover/click
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product detail page
Step 2: Hover over main product image
Step 3: Verify zoom effect is triggered
Step 4: Move cursor to see different parts of zoomed image
Step 5: Confirm zoom deactivates when cursor leaves

description: Product variants (size, color) can be selected
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product detail page with variants
Step 2: Click on different size options
Step 3: Verify selected size is highlighted
Step 4: Click on different color options
Step 5: Verify selected color is highlighted
Step 6: Confirm price updates if variant has price adjustment

description: Stock availability indicator shows correct status
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product with high stock
Step 2: Verify 'In Stock' message is displayed
Step 3: Navigate to product with low stock
Step 4: Verify 'Low Stock' or quantity remaining message
Step 5: Navigate to product with zero stock
Step 6: Verify 'Out of Stock' message and disabled add to cart button

description: Related products section displays relevant products
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product detail page
Step 2: Scroll to related products section
Step 3: Verify at least 3-4 related products are shown
Step 4: Check that related products are from same category or brand
Step 5: Click on a related product and verify navigation works

description: Recently viewed products section tracks and displays history
steps: Step 1: Navigate to multiple product detail pages
Step 2: Return to homepage or products page
Step 3: Verify recently viewed section displays previously viewed products
Step 4: Check that most recent products appear first
Step 5: Confirm clicking on recently viewed product navigates correctly

description: Category navigation displays all categories
steps: Step 1: Navigate to homepage
Step 2: Click on categories menu in header
Step 3: Verify mega menu displays with all categories
Step 4: Check that subcategories are shown under parent categories
Step 5: Hover over categories to see hover effects

description: Category filtering shows only products in selected category
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click on a specific category
Step 3: Verify URL updates with category slug
Step 4: Confirm only products from selected category are displayed
Step 5: Check that category name is highlighted in filters
Step 6: Verify product count matches filtered results

description: Subcategory filtering works within parent category
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Select a parent category
Step 3: Click on a subcategory
Step 4: Verify only products from subcategory are displayed
Step 5: Confirm breadcrumb shows parent > subcategory
Step 6: Check that product count updates

description: Brand filtering shows only products from selected brands
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Open brand filter in sidebar
Step 3: Select one or more brand checkboxes
Step 4: Verify products are filtered to selected brands only
Step 5: Unselect a brand and confirm products update
Step 6: Clear all brand filters and verify all products show again

description: Price range filtering filters products by price
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Open price range filter in sidebar
Step 3: Set minimum and maximum price values
Step 4: Apply filter
Step 5: Verify only products within price range are displayed
Step 6: Check that most expensive and cheapest visible products are within range

description: Price range slider provides visual adjustment
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Open price range filter
Step 3: Drag minimum price slider handle
Step 4: Verify price value updates in real-time
Step 5: Drag maximum price slider handle
Step 6: Confirm products filter as slider is adjusted

description: Sort by price low to high works correctly
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click sort dropdown
Step 3: Select 'Price: Low to High'
Step 4: Verify products are reordered with cheapest first
Step 5: Check that each subsequent product has equal or higher price

description: Sort by price high to low works correctly
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click sort dropdown
Step 3: Select 'Price: High to Low'
Step 4: Verify products are reordered with most expensive first
Step 5: Check that each subsequent product has equal or lower price

description: Sort by popularity shows most popular products first
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click sort dropdown
Step 3: Select 'Popularity'
Step 4: Verify products are reordered by popularity metric
Step 5: Confirm most reviewed or highest-rated products appear first

description: Sort by newest shows recently added products first
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click sort dropdown
Step 3: Select 'Newest'
Step 4: Verify products are ordered by creation date descending
Step 5: Check that most recently added products appear first

description: Sort by rating shows highest rated products first
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click sort dropdown
Step 3: Select 'Rating'
Step 4: Verify products are ordered by average rating descending
Step 5: Confirm 5-star products appear before 4-star products

description: Pagination displays correct number of products per page
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Count products displayed on first page
Step 3: Verify count matches expected per-page limit (e.g., 12 or 24)
Step 4: Scroll to bottom and check pagination controls are visible

description: Pagination navigation between pages works
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Note the first product on page 1
Step 3: Click 'Next' or page 2 button
Step 4: Verify different products are displayed
Step 5: Click 'Previous' or page 1 button
Step 6: Confirm original products from page 1 are shown

description: Infinite scroll option loads more products on scroll
steps: Step 1: Enable infinite scroll mode (if toggle available)
Step 2: Navigate to products page
Step 3: Scroll to bottom of page
Step 4: Verify loading indicator appears
Step 5: Confirm additional products are loaded and appended
Step 6: Continue scrolling and verify more products load

description: Search bar is accessible from all pages
steps: Step 1: Navigate to homepage
Step 2: Verify search bar is visible in header
Step 3: Navigate to product detail page
Step 4: Confirm search bar is still visible
Step 5: Navigate to checkout page
Step 6: Verify search bar remains accessible

description: Full-text search returns relevant product results
steps: Step 1: Click on search bar
Step 2: Type a product keyword (e.g., 'shirt')
Step 3: Press Enter or click search button
Step 4: Verify search results page displays
Step 5: Check that all results contain the search keyword
Step 6: Verify result count is displayed

description: Search autocomplete shows suggestions while typing
steps: Step 1: Click on search bar
Step 2: Start typing a product name
Step 3: Verify dropdown appears with search suggestions
Step 4: Check that suggestions update as more characters are typed
Step 5: Click on a suggestion
Step 6: Verify navigation to product or search results

description: Search filters can be applied to search results
steps: Step 1: Perform a search query
Step 2: View search results page
Step 3: Apply category filter to search results
Step 4: Verify results are filtered by category
Step 5: Apply price range filter
Step 6: Confirm results update to match both filters
Step 7: Apply brand filter
Step 8: Verify all filters work together

description: Search history displays previous searches
steps: Step 1: Perform several searches
Step 2: Click on search bar without typing
Step 3: Verify dropdown shows recent search history
Step 4: Click on a previous search
Step 5: Confirm search is re-executed with same query

description: No results page displays when search has no matches
steps: Step 1: Enter a search query that won't match any products
Step 2: Submit search
Step 3: Verify 'no results' message is displayed
Step 4: Check that alternative suggestions are offered
Step 5: Verify option to clear filters or try different search is available

description: Add to cart from product listing page
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Click 'Add to Cart' button on a product card
Step 3: Verify success message or toast notification appears
Step 4: Check that cart icon badge updates with item count
Step 5: Open cart drawer and confirm product is in cart

description: Add to cart from product detail page with quantity selection
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product detail page
Step 2: Select product variant (size, color) if available
Step 3: Adjust quantity using quantity picker
Step 4: Click 'Add to Cart' button
Step 5: Verify success message appears
Step 6: Check cart icon badge shows correct quantity
Step 7: Open cart and verify product with selected variant and quantity

description: Cart drawer opens from header cart icon
steps: Step 1: Add at least one product to cart
Step 2: Click on cart icon in header
Step 3: Verify cart drawer slides out from right side
Step 4: Check that cart items are displayed with images
Step 5: Confirm subtotal is shown at bottom

description: Cart drawer displays all cart items with details
steps: Step 1: Add multiple products to cart
Step 2: Open cart drawer
Step 3: Verify each item shows product image
Step 4: Check that product name and variant details are displayed
Step 5: Confirm quantity and individual price are shown
Step 6: Verify item subtotal is calculated correctly

description: Update quantity of item in cart
steps: Step 1: Add a product to cart
Step 2: Open cart drawer
Step 3: Click increase quantity button
Step 4: Verify quantity increments by 1
Step 5: Check that item subtotal updates
Step 6: Click decrease quantity button
Step 7: Verify quantity decrements by 1
Step 8: Confirm subtotal recalculates

description: Remove item from cart
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Open cart drawer
Step 3: Click remove/delete button on an item
Step 4: Verify confirmation prompt appears (if applicable)
Step 5: Confirm removal
Step 6: Check that item is removed from cart
Step 7: Verify cart count badge updates
Step 8: Confirm subtotal recalculates

description: Save for later moves item from cart to saved list
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Open cart drawer
Step 3: Click 'Save for Later' on an item
Step 4: Verify item is removed from cart section
Step 5: Check that item appears in 'Saved for Later' section
Step 6: Verify cart subtotal updates without saved item
Step 7: Click 'Move to Cart' on saved item
Step 8: Confirm item returns to cart

description: Cart persistence saves cart to localStorage
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Close browser tab
Step 3: Reopen application
Step 4: Verify cart icon shows previous item count
Step 5: Open cart drawer
Step 6: Confirm all previous items are still in cart

description: Cart syncs with server for logged-in users
steps: Step 1: Login as a user
Step 2: Add products to cart
Step 3: Logout
Step 4: Login again on different browser/device
Step 5: Verify cart items are synced from server
Step 6: Check that all products and quantities match

description: Cart merges local and server cart on login
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart as guest
Step 2: Login to existing account
Step 3: Verify local cart items are merged with server cart
Step 4: Check that no items are lost
Step 5: Confirm duplicate items have quantities combined

description: Cart item count badge displays correct number
steps: Step 1: Start with empty cart
Step 2: Verify cart badge shows 0 or is hidden
Step 3: Add one item to cart
Step 4: Check badge shows 1
Step 5: Add another item with quantity 3
Step 6: Verify badge shows total quantity (4)

description: Estimated shipping cost is calculated in cart
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Open cart drawer or cart page
Step 3: Verify estimated shipping cost is displayed
Step 4: Check that shipping calculation is based on cart total or weight
Step 5: Add more items and confirm shipping recalculates

description: Promo code can be applied to cart
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Open cart page
Step 3: Locate promo code input field
Step 4: Enter a valid promo code
Step 5: Click apply button
Step 6: Verify success message appears
Step 7: Check that discount is applied to subtotal
Step 8: Confirm total reflects discounted price

description: Invalid promo code shows error message
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Navigate to cart page
Step 3: Enter an invalid or expired promo code
Step 4: Click apply button
Step 5: Verify error message is displayed
Step 6: Check that no discount is applied to cart

description: Promo code can be removed from cart
steps: Step 1: Apply a valid promo code to cart
Step 2: Verify discount is applied
Step 3: Click remove or clear promo code button
Step 4: Confirm discount is removed
Step 5: Check that cart total returns to original amount

description: Cart summary displays all cost breakdowns
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Navigate to cart page
Step 3: Verify subtotal is displayed and correct
Step 4: Check that shipping cost is shown
Step 5: Verify tax calculation is displayed (if applicable)
Step 6: Confirm discount amount is shown (if promo applied)
Step 7: Check that final total is calculated correctly
Step 8: Verify all amounts sum to total

description: Continue shopping link returns to previous page
steps: Step 1: Browse products on a category page
Step 2: Add item to cart
Step 3: Open cart drawer
Step 4: Click 'Continue Shopping' link
Step 5: Verify cart drawer closes
Step 6: Confirm user returns to previous product page

description: Proceed to checkout button navigates to checkout
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Open cart drawer or cart page
Step 3: Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button
Step 4: Verify navigation to checkout page
Step 5: Check that checkout page shows cart items

description: Empty cart displays appropriate message
steps: Step 1: Ensure cart is empty
Step 2: Click on cart icon
Step 3: Verify 'Your cart is empty' message is displayed
Step 4: Check that 'Start Shopping' or similar CTA is present
Step 5: Confirm checkout button is disabled

description: User profile page displays user information
steps: Step 1: Login as a user
Step 2: Navigate to profile page from account menu
Step 3: Verify name is displayed
Step 4: Check that email is shown
Step 5: Confirm phone number is displayed (if provided)
Step 6: Verify avatar/profile picture is shown

description: User can update profile information
steps: Step 1: Login and navigate to profile page
Step 2: Click edit profile button
Step 3: Update name field
Step 4: Update phone number
Step 5: Submit changes
Step 6: Verify success message appears
Step 7: Refresh page and confirm changes persisted
Step 8: Check database to verify updates

description: User can change password from profile
steps: Step 1: Login and navigate to profile page
Step 2: Click change password option
Step 3: Enter current password
Step 4: Enter new password
Step 5: Confirm new password
Step 6: Submit form
Step 7: Verify success message
Step 8: Logout and login with new password
Step 9: Confirm new password works

description: Address book displays saved addresses
steps: Step 1: Login as user with saved addresses
Step 2: Navigate to address book from account menu
Step 3: Verify all saved addresses are displayed
Step 4: Check that address details are complete (street, city, state, zip)
Step 5: Confirm default address is marked/highlighted

description: User can add new address to address book
steps: Step 1: Navigate to address book
Step 2: Click 'Add New Address' button
Step 3: Fill in address form (name, street, city, state, postal code)
Step 4: Set address label (Home, Work, etc.)
Step 5: Submit form
Step 6: Verify success message
Step 7: Confirm new address appears in address book
Step 8: Check database to verify address was saved

description: User can edit existing address
steps: Step 1: Navigate to address book with existing addresses
Step 2: Click edit button on an address
Step 3: Modify address fields
Step 4: Submit changes
Step 5: Verify success message
Step 6: Confirm address updates are displayed
Step 7: Check that database reflects changes

description: User can delete address from address book
steps: Step 1: Navigate to address book with multiple addresses
Step 2: Click delete button on an address
Step 3: Verify confirmation prompt appears
Step 4: Confirm deletion
Step 5: Check that address is removed from list
Step 6: Verify deletion from database

description: User can set default address
steps: Step 1: Navigate to address book with multiple addresses
Step 2: Click 'Set as Default' on a non-default address
Step 3: Verify confirmation or immediate update
Step 4: Check that new address is marked as default
Step 5: Confirm previous default is no longer marked
Step 6: Navigate to checkout and verify default address is pre-selected

description: Order history displays all past orders
steps: Step 1: Login as user with order history
Step 2: Navigate to order history from account menu
Step 3: Verify list of orders is displayed
Step 4: Check that each order shows order number, date, and total
Step 5: Confirm order status is displayed for each
Step 6: Verify orders are sorted by date (newest first)

description: Order detail page shows complete order information
steps: Step 1: Navigate to order history
Step 2: Click on an order to view details
Step 3: Verify order number and date are displayed
Step 4: Check that all order items are listed with images
Step 5: Confirm quantities and prices for each item
Step 6: Verify shipping address is shown
Step 7: Check that order status and tracking info are displayed
Step 8: Confirm payment method and amounts are shown

description: Wishlist page displays all saved items
steps: Step 1: Login as user with wishlist items
Step 2: Navigate to wishlist from account menu or wishlist icon
Step 3: Verify all wishlist items are displayed
Step 4: Check that each item shows image, name, and price
Step 5: Confirm remove button is present on each item

description: Add product to wishlist from product detail page
steps: Step 1: Login as a user
Step 2: Navigate to product detail page
Step 3: Click heart or 'Add to Wishlist' button
Step 4: Verify success message or heart fills in
Step 5: Check that wishlist icon badge increments
Step 6: Navigate to wishlist page
Step 7: Confirm product appears in wishlist

description: Add product to wishlist from product listing card
steps: Step 1: Login as a user
Step 2: Navigate to products page
Step 3: Click heart icon on a product card
Step 4: Verify heart icon fills or changes color
Step 5: Check that wishlist count increments
Step 6: View wishlist and confirm product was added

description: Remove product from wishlist
steps: Step 1: Navigate to wishlist with items
Step 2: Click remove button or heart icon on an item
Step 3: Verify confirmation prompt (if applicable)
Step 4: Confirm removal
Step 5: Check that item is removed from wishlist
Step 6: Verify wishlist count decrements

description: Move product from wishlist to cart
steps: Step 1: Navigate to wishlist with items
Step 2: Click 'Move to Cart' or 'Add to Cart' on an item
Step 3: Verify item is added to cart
Step 4: Check cart icon badge increments
Step 5: Optionally verify item is removed from wishlist
Step 6: Open cart and confirm product is there

description: Share wishlist generates shareable link
steps: Step 1: Navigate to wishlist with items
Step 2: Click 'Share Wishlist' button
Step 3: Verify shareable link is generated
Step 4: Copy link to clipboard
Step 5: Open link in new browser/incognito window
Step 6: Confirm wishlist items are viewable without login

description: Wishlist shows low stock notifications
steps: Step 1: Add product with low stock to wishlist
Step 2: Navigate to wishlist page
Step 3: Verify low stock badge or message is displayed
Step 4: Check that notification stands out visually
Step 5: Add product with out of stock to wishlist
Step 6: Verify 'Out of Stock' message appears

description: Guest users must login to access wishlist
steps: Step 1: Logout or use incognito mode
Step 2: Navigate to product page
Step 3: Click 'Add to Wishlist' button
Step 4: Verify redirect to login page or login modal appears
Step 5: Login with credentials
Step 6: Confirm product is added to wishlist after login

description: Checkout page displays progress stepper
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart and proceed to checkout
Step 2: Verify checkout page loads
Step 3: Check that progress stepper is visible at top
Step 4: Confirm stepper shows all steps (Shipping, Payment, Review)
Step 5: Verify current step is highlighted

description: Checkout step 1: Shipping address form validates input
steps: Step 1: Navigate to checkout
Step 2: Attempt to submit empty address form
Step 3: Verify validation errors appear for required fields
Step 4: Fill in invalid email format
Step 5: Check that email validation error appears
Step 6: Enter invalid postal code
Step 7: Verify postal code validation error

description: Checkout shipping address can be selected from saved addresses
steps: Step 1: Login as user with saved addresses
Step 2: Navigate to checkout
Step 3: Verify list of saved addresses is displayed
Step 4: Click to select a saved address
Step 5: Confirm address fields are auto-filled
Step 6: Verify ability to proceed to next step

description: Checkout allows entering new shipping address
steps: Step 1: Navigate to checkout
Step 2: Select 'Add New Address' option
Step 3: Fill in complete address form
Step 4: Check 'Save to address book' checkbox
Step 5: Submit and proceed to next step
Step 6: Verify address is saved to account (check address book later)

description: Address autocomplete suggests addresses as user types
steps: Step 1: Navigate to checkout address form
Step 2: Start typing street address
Step 3: Verify autocomplete dropdown appears with suggestions
Step 4: Click on a suggested address
Step 5: Confirm all address fields are auto-filled
Step 6: Verify city, state, and postal code are populated

description: Checkout step 2: Shipping method selection displays options
steps: Step 1: Complete shipping address and proceed to shipping method
Step 2: Verify multiple shipping options are displayed
Step 3: Check that each option shows cost and delivery timeframe
Step 4: Confirm one option is pre-selected (default)
Step 5: Verify order summary updates with shipping cost

description: User can select different shipping methods
steps: Step 1: Navigate to shipping method step
Step 2: Note current total with default shipping
Step 3: Select express shipping option
Step 4: Verify express shipping is highlighted as selected
Step 5: Check that order total updates with new shipping cost
Step 6: Select standard shipping
Step 7: Confirm total updates again

description: Checkout step 3: Payment form with Stripe Elements loads
steps: Step 1: Complete shipping steps and proceed to payment
Step 2: Verify payment step is displayed
Step 3: Check that Stripe card element is embedded and visible
Step 4: Verify placeholder text in card input
Step 5: Confirm CVV and expiry fields are present

description: Stripe payment form validates card information
steps: Step 1: Navigate to payment step
Step 2: Enter invalid card number
Step 3: Verify Stripe shows validation error
Step 4: Enter expired card expiry date
Step 5: Check that expiry validation error appears
Step 6: Enter invalid CVV
Step 7: Verify CVV error message

description: Payment step creates Stripe payment intent
steps: Step 1: Navigate to payment step
Step 2: Enter valid test card (4242 4242 4242 4242)
Step 3: Fill in expiry and CVV
Step 4: Check browser network tab for payment intent API call
Step 5: Verify payment intent is created successfully
Step 6: Confirm client secret is received

description: Checkout step 4: Review order summary before confirming
steps: Step 1: Complete all checkout steps and reach review step
Step 2: Verify all order items are displayed
Step 3: Check that shipping address is shown
Step 4: Confirm shipping method is displayed
Step 5: Verify payment method is shown (last 4 digits)
Step 6: Check all cost breakdowns (subtotal, shipping, tax, total)
Step 7: Verify 'Place Order' button is present

description: User can edit shipping address from review step
steps: Step 1: Navigate to review step
Step 2: Click 'Edit' next to shipping address
Step 3: Verify navigation back to address step
Step 4: Modify address
Step 5: Proceed through steps back to review
Step 6: Confirm updated address is displayed

description: User can edit shipping method from review step
steps: Step 1: Navigate to review step
Step 2: Click 'Edit' next to shipping method
Step 3: Verify navigation back to shipping method step
Step 4: Select different shipping option
Step 5: Proceed to review step
Step 6: Confirm new shipping method and updated total are displayed

description: Place order completes checkout and creates order
steps: Step 1: Complete all checkout steps and reach review
Step 2: Click 'Place Order' button
Step 3: Verify loading indicator appears
Step 4: Wait for order processing
Step 5: Confirm navigation to order confirmation page
Step 6: Check that order number is displayed
Step 7: Verify cart is emptied
Step 8: Check database for created order record

description: Order confirmation page displays order details
steps: Step 1: Complete an order successfully
Step 2: View order confirmation page
Step 3: Verify success message is displayed
Step 4: Check that order number is shown prominently
Step 5: Confirm order date is displayed
Step 6: Verify order items are listed
Step 7: Check that shipping address is shown
Step 8: Confirm total amount charged is displayed

description: Order confirmation email is sent (mock)
steps: Step 1: Complete an order
Step 2: Check server logs or mock email service
Step 3: Verify email send was triggered
Step 4: Confirm email contains order number
Step 5: Check that email includes order items and total

description: Guest checkout allows purchase without account
steps: Step 1: Logout or use incognito mode
Step 2: Add products to cart
Step 3: Proceed to checkout
Step 4: Verify 'Continue as Guest' option is available
Step 5: Click continue as guest
Step 6: Complete checkout with email and shipping info
Step 7: Place order successfully
Step 8: Confirm order is created without user account

description: Express checkout provides fast path to payment
steps: Step 1: Login as user with default address
Step 2: Add products to cart
Step 3: Click 'Express Checkout' button
Step 4: Verify checkout skips to payment step
Step 5: Confirm default address is used
Step 6: Check that standard shipping is pre-selected
Step 7: Complete payment and place order

description: Order status tracking shows current order status
steps: Step 1: Place an order
Step 2: Navigate to order detail page
Step 3: Verify order status is displayed (pending, processing, etc.)
Step 4: Check that status timeline or progress bar is shown
Step 5: Confirm estimated delivery date is displayed (if applicable)

description: Order tracking shows shipment tracking number
steps: Step 1: View order that has been shipped
Step 2: Navigate to order detail page
Step 3: Verify tracking number is displayed
Step 4: Check that carrier name is shown
Step 5: Confirm 'Track Package' link is present and functional

description: Reorder functionality creates new cart from previous order
steps: Step 1: Navigate to order history
Step 2: Click 'Reorder' button on a past order
Step 3: Verify all items from order are added to cart
Step 4: Check cart icon badge updates with item count
Step 5: Open cart and confirm all items with correct quantities
Step 6: Verify navigation to cart or checkout

description: Order invoice can be downloaded as PDF (mock)
steps: Step 1: Navigate to order detail page
Step 2: Click 'Download Invoice' button
Step 3: Verify invoice generation is triggered
Step 4: Check that PDF download starts or opens
Step 5: Confirm invoice contains order number, items, and totals

Step 2: Click 'Cancel Order' button
Step 3: Verify cancellation confirmation prompt
Step 4: Confirm cancellation
Step 5: Check that order status updates to 'cancelled'
Step 6: Verify order appears as cancelled in order history
Step 7: Confirm database reflects cancelled status

description: Cancel order is disabled for shipped orders
steps: Step 1: View order with 'shipped' or 'delivered' status
Step 2: Verify 'Cancel Order' button is disabled or hidden
Step 3: Check that message explains order cannot be cancelled
Step 4: Confirm contact support option is available

description: Product reviews display on product detail page
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product with reviews
Step 2: Scroll to reviews section
Step 3: Verify reviews are displayed
Step 4: Check that each review shows star rating
Step 5: Confirm reviewer name and date are shown
Step 6: Verify review title and content are displayed

steps: Step 1: Login and navigate to product page
Step 2: Scroll to reviews section
Step 3: Click 'Write a Review' button
Step 4: Select star rating (1-5)
Step 5: Enter review title
Step 6: Enter review text content
Step 7: Submit review
Step 8: Verify success message
Step 9: Confirm review appears in reviews list
Step 10: Check database for review record

description: Review form validates required fields

Step 2: Attempt to submit without selecting rating
Step 3: Verify validation error for rating
Step 4: Select rating but leave text empty
Step 5: Submit form
Step 6: Check that review text validation error appears

description: Upload photos with product review
steps: Step 1: Navigate to write review form
Step 2: Fill in rating and text
Step 3: Click 'Add Photos' button
Step 4: Select image files from file system
Step 5: Verify image previews appear
Step 6: Submit review
Step 7: Confirm review is posted with images
Step 8: View review and verify images are displayed

description: Verified purchase badge displays on reviews from buyers
steps: Step 1: Purchase a product
Step 2: Submit review for purchased product
Step 3: View product reviews
Step 4: Verify your review shows 'Verified Purchase' badge
Step 5: Check that badge visually distinguishes verified reviews
Step 6: Compare with non-verified reviews (no badge)

description: Helpful/not helpful voting on reviews
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product reviews
Step 2: Click 'Helpful' button on a review
Step 3: Verify helpful count increments
Step 4: Check that button state changes (e.g., filled icon)
Step 5: Click 'Not Helpful' on another review

description: Reviews can be filtered by star rating

Step 2: Click on 5-star rating filter
Step 3: Verify only 5-star reviews are displayed
Step 4: Click on 3-star rating filter
Step 5: Confirm only 3-star reviews are shown

description: Reviews can be sorted by date, helpfulness, or rating

Step 2: Select 'Most Recent' sort option
Step 3: Verify reviews are ordered by date descending
Step 4: Select 'Most Helpful' sort option
Step 5: Confirm reviews are ordered by helpful count
Step 6: Select 'Highest Rating' sort option
Step 7: Verify 5-star reviews appear first

description: Average product rating is calculated and displayed
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product with multiple reviews
Step 2: Verify average rating is displayed (e.g., 4.5 stars)
Step 3: Check that rating is shown as stars and numeric value
Step 4: Confirm total review count is displayed
Step 5: Verify average rating on product listing card matches

description: Rating distribution chart shows breakdown of ratings
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product reviews
Step 2: Verify rating distribution chart/graph is displayed
Step 3: Check that each star level (1-5) shows count or percentage
Step 4: Confirm visual bars represent proportions correctly
Step 5: Click on a rating bar and verify reviews filter to that rating

description: User can edit their own review
steps: Step 1: Login and navigate to product you reviewed
Step 2: Find your review in the reviews list
Step 3: Click 'Edit' button on your review
Step 4: Modify rating or review text
Step 5: Submit changes
Step 6: Verify success message
Step 7: Confirm review updates are displayed
Step 8: Check database for updated review

description: User can delete their own review
steps: Step 1: Login and find a product you reviewed
Step 2: Navigate to your review
Step 3: Click 'Delete' button
Step 4: Verify confirmation prompt appears
Step 5: Confirm deletion
Step 6: Check that review is removed from list
Step 7: Verify database record is deleted

description: Users cannot edit or delete others' reviews

Step 2: View reviews from other users
Step 3: Verify edit and delete buttons are not present on others' reviews

description: Admin dashboard displays key metrics

Step 2: Navigate to admin dashboard
Step 3: Verify total revenue metric is displayed
Step 4: Check that total orders count is shown

description: Admin can edit existing product

description: Admin can delete product

description: Admin can view customer list

Step 2: Navigate to Customers section
Step 3: Verify list of all customers is displayed
Step 4: Check that customer name and email are shown

description: Admin can view individual customer details
steps: Step 1: Navigate to admin customers list
Step 2: Click on a customer
Step 3: Verify customer profile details are displayed
Step 4: Check that order history for this customer is shown
Step 5: Confirm addresses associated with customer are listed
Step 6: Verify total lifetime value is calculated

description: Admin can manage product categories
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Categories section in admin
Step 2: Verify list of categories is displayed
Step 3: Click 'Add Category' button
Step 4: Enter category name and description
Step 5: Set parent category (for subcategory)

description: Admin can edit and delete categories
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Categories in admin
Step 2: Click edit on a category
Step 3: Modify category name
Step 4: Save changes
Step 5: Verify updates are displayed
Step 6: Click delete on another category
Step 7: Confirm deletion prompt

description: Admin can create and manage promo codes
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Promo Codes section in admin
Step 2: Click 'Create Promo Code'
Step 3: Enter code name (e.g., SAVE20)
Step 4: Select discount type (percentage or fixed)

description: Admin can view sales analytics dashboard
steps: Step 1: Login as admin
Step 2: Navigate to Analytics section
Step 3: Verify revenue chart is displayed
Step 4: Check that time period can be selected (day, week, month)
Step 5: Confirm sales by category chart is shown
Step 6: Verify top selling products are listed

description: Admin can filter analytics by date range
steps: Step 1: Navigate to admin analytics
Step 2: Select custom date range
Step 3: Set start and end dates

Step 5: Verify charts and metrics update for selected period

description: Admin can view inventory tracking
steps: Step 1: Navigate to Inventory section in admin
Step 2: Verify list of all products with stock levels

description: Admin can generate revenue reports

Step 2: Select 'Revenue Report'

Step 5: Verify report displays with summary metrics

Step 2: Attempt to navigate to admin dashboard URL
Step 3: Verify access is denied or redirected to homepage

description: Social login with Google works (mock implementation)
steps: Step 1: Navigate to login page
Step 2: Click 'Sign in with Google' button
Step 3: Verify mock Google OAuth flow initiates
Step 4: Complete mock authorization
Step 5: Confirm user is logged in
Step 6: Check that user account is created or linked

description: Email verification flow after registration
steps: Step 1: Register new account
Step 2: Verify message about verification email is shown
Step 3: Check mock email or logs for verification link
Step 4: Click verification link
Step 5: Confirm account is marked as verified
Step 6: Check database email_verified field is true

description: User can delete their account
steps: Step 1: Login and navigate to account settings
Step 2: Click 'Delete Account' option
Step 3: Verify warning message about permanent deletion
Step 4: Enter password to confirm
Step 5: Submit deletion request
Step 6: Confirm account is deleted from database
Step 7: Verify unable to login with deleted account credentials

description: Quick view modal shows product summary

Step 4: Verify modal opens with product details

description: Featured products section on homepage
steps: Step 1: Navigate to homepage
Step 2: Scroll to featured products section
Step 3: Verify featured products are displayed
Step 4: Check that products marked as featured in admin appear
Step 5: Confirm section has appropriate heading
Step 6: Click on featured product and verify navigation

description: Sale/discount badges display on products
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products with compare_at_price set
Step 2: Verify sale badge is displayed on product card
Step 3: Check that discount percentage is calculated and shown
Step 4: Confirm original price shows as strikethrough
Step 5: Verify sale price is highlighted in red or accent color

description: Logout functionality clears session
steps: Step 1: Login as a user
Step 2: Click logout from account menu
Step 3: Verify redirect to homepage or login page
Step 4: Check that account menu shows logged-out state

Step 6: Attempt to access protected page and verify redirect to login

description: Homepage has professional e-commerce design

Step 2: Take screenshot of entire page
Step 3: Verify clean, modern design aesthetic
Step 4: Check that hero section is visually appealing
Step 5: Confirm consistent branding and color scheme
Step 6: Verify clear call-to-action buttons

description: Header navigation is well-designed and accessible

Step 2: Take screenshot of header
Step 3: Verify logo is prominent and left-aligned
Step 4: Check that category menu is clear and organized
Step 5: Confirm search bar is centered and visible
Step 6: Verify icons (account, wishlist, cart) are right-aligned and clear

description: Product cards have consistent styling
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Take screenshot of product grid
Step 3: Verify all cards have same dimensions
Step 4: Check that images are properly sized and centered
Step 5: Confirm typography is consistent across cards
Step 6: Verify hover effects are smooth and consistent

description: Product card hover effects are polished

Step 2: Hover over product cards
Step 3: Verify smooth transition effects on hover
Step 4: Check that shadow or elevation increases on hover

description: Color palette matches design system

description: Typography is consistent and readable

Step 3: Verify Inter or system-ui font is used
Step 4: Check that heading hierarchy is clear
Step 5: Confirm body text is readable (text-sm to text-base)
Step 6: Verify sufficient line-height for readability

description: Buttons have consistent pill-shaped style
steps: Step 1: Navigate through pages with various buttons
Step 2: Take screenshots
Step 3: Verify all primary buttons have rounded corners
Step 4: Check that button sizing is consistent
Step 5: Confirm hover and active states are styled
Step 6: Verify disabled buttons have appropriate styling

description: Star rating component is visually clear
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product with ratings
Step 2: Take screenshot of star rating
Step 3: Verify stars are clear and recognizable
Step 4: Check that filled vs empty stars are distinct
Step 5: Confirm half-star display for partial ratings
Step 6: Verify rating aligns with numeric value

description: Product detail page layout is well-organized

Step 2: Take screenshot of full page

Step 4: Check that product info section is organized on right

description: Shopping cart drawer has clean design

Step 5: Confirm product images are appropriately sized
Step 6: Verify subtotal and checkout button are prominent at bottom

description: Checkout flow has clear progress indicator
steps: Step 1: Navigate to checkout
Step 2: Take screenshot of stepper
Step 3: Verify progress stepper is clear and visible
Step 4: Check that current step is highlighted
Step 5: Confirm completed steps have checkmark or different style
Step 6: Verify upcoming steps are visually distinct

description: Form inputs have consistent styling

Step 2: Take screenshots
Step 3: Verify all inputs have consistent height and padding
Step 4: Check that borders and focus states are styled
Step 5: Confirm error states are clearly visible in red
Step 6: Verify labels are properly aligned

description: Mobile navigation menu is well-designed

Step 2: Take screenshot of header

Step 6: Confirm close button is obvious and accessible

description: Mobile product cards are touch-optimized

Step 2: Take screenshot

Step 4: Check that tap targets are at least 44x44px
Step 5: Confirm spacing between cards is adequate
Step 6: Verify text is readable without zooming

description: Responsive design works at tablet breakpoint
steps: Step 1: Resize browser to tablet width (768px)
Step 2: Take screenshots of multiple pages
Step 3: Verify layout adapts appropriately
Step 4: Check that product grid adjusts columns
Step 5: Confirm navigation is still usable
Step 6: Verify no horizontal scrolling

description: Responsive design works at mobile breakpoint
steps: Step 1: Resize browser to mobile width (375px)
Step 2: Take screenshots of multiple pages
Step 3: Verify layout stacks vertically
Step 4: Check that all content is accessible
Step 5: Confirm buttons and links are touch-friendly
Step 6: Verify no content is cut off

description: Loading states use skeleton loaders
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Refresh and observe loading state

Step 4: Verify skeleton shapes match content layout
Step 5: Confirm smooth transition from skeleton to content

description: Error messages are clearly styled and visible
steps: Step 1: Trigger form validation errors
Step 2: Take screenshot
Step 3: Verify error messages are in red color
Step 4: Check that error text is below/beside relevant field

Step 5: Confirm checkmark icon is present

description: Footer has organized layout with links

Step 5: Confirm social media icons are present

description: Admin dashboard has professional interface

Step 5: Confirm charts and graphs are visually appealing
Step 6: Verify consistent spacing and alignment

description: Badge components (sale, new, bestseller) are distinctive

Step 5: Confirm 'bestseller' badge is recognizable
Step 6: Verify badges don't overlap with product images

description: Category mega menu has organized layout

description: Search autocomplete dropdown is well-styled
steps: Step 1: Click search and start typing
Step 2: Take screenshot of autocomplete dropdown
Step 3: Verify dropdown has shadow or border
Step 4: Check that suggestions are clearly separated
Step 5: Confirm hover state highlights suggestion
Step 6: Verify product images in suggestions are appropriately sized

description: Order confirmation page is celebratory and clear
steps: Step 1: Complete an order
Step 2: Take screenshot of confirmation page
Step 3: Verify success icon or checkmark is prominent
Step 4: Check that success message is celebratory
Step 5: Confirm order number is displayed clearly
Step 6: Verify next steps are clearly outlined

description: Empty states (cart, wishlist) are helpful and encouraging
steps: Step 1: View empty cart
Step 2: Take screenshot
Step 3: Verify empty state illustration or icon is present
Step 4: Check that message is friendly and encouraging
Step 5: Confirm CTA button is prominent
Step 6: Repeat for empty wishlist and verify similar quality

description: API endpoints use proper RESTful conventions
steps: Step 1: Review API endpoint structure
Step 2: Verify GET endpoints for retrieving data
Step 3: Check POST endpoints for creating resources
Step 4: Confirm PUT/PATCH for updates
Step 5: Verify DELETE endpoints for deletions
Step 6: Check that endpoints follow naming conventions

description: API returns proper status codes
steps: Step 1: Make successful API request
Step 2: Verify 200 status code for success
Step 3: Create a new resource
Step 4: Check for 201 created status
Step 5: Request non-existent resource
Step 6: Verify 404 not found
Step 7: Send invalid data
Step 8: Confirm 400 bad request

description: API handles validation errors gracefully
steps: Step 1: Send API request with invalid data
Step 2: Verify 400 status code is returned
Step 3: Check that error response includes validation messages
Step 4: Confirm error format is consistent (JSON)
Step 5: Verify specific field errors are identified

description: Database foreign key constraints are enforced
steps: Step 1: Attempt to create order_item with non-existent product_id
Step 2: Verify database constraint prevents creation
Step 3: Check that appropriate error is returned
Step 4: Verify referential integrity is maintained
Step 5: Test with other foreign key relationships

description: Product stock decrements when order is placed
steps: Step 1: Note current stock quantity of a product
Step 2: Add product to cart with quantity 2
Step 3: Complete checkout and place order
Step 4: Check product stock in database
Step 5: Verify stock decreased by 2
Step 6: Confirm stock update is reflected on product page

description: Cart items sync when user logs in
steps: Step 1: As guest, add products to cart
Step 2: Note cart items and quantities
Step 3: Login to existing account (that already has cart items)
Step 4: Verify guest cart items are merged with user cart
Step 5: Check that quantities are summed for duplicate items
Step 6: Confirm no items are lost in merge

description: Images are lazy-loaded for performance
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page with many products
Step 2: Open browser dev tools network tab
Step 3: Verify only visible images are loaded initially
Step 4: Scroll down page
Step 5: Confirm images load as they enter viewport
Step 6: Check that loading attribute or IntersectionObserver is used

description: Product filtering maintains URL state
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page
Step 2: Apply category and price filters
Step 3: Check that URL updates with filter parameters
Step 4: Copy URL and open in new tab
Step 5: Verify filters are applied based on URL parameters
Step 6: Confirm same filtered results are displayed

description: SEO meta tags are properly set on pages
steps: Step 1: Navigate to homepage
Step 2: View page source
Step 3: Verify title tag is present and descriptive
Step 4: Check that meta description is present
Step 5: Navigate to product detail page
Step 6: Verify dynamic title includes product name
Step 7: Confirm og:image tag is present for social sharing

description: Bottom navigation appears on mobile for key actions
steps: Step 1: View site on mobile width
Step 2: Scroll through a page
Step 3: Verify bottom navigation bar is visible and sticky
Step 4: Check that key actions are accessible (Home, Search, Cart, Account)
Step 5: Tap each navigation item and verify navigation works

description: Sticky add to cart button on mobile product pages
steps: Step 1: View product detail on mobile width
Step 2: Scroll down the page
Step 3: Verify add to cart button becomes sticky at bottom

description: Swipe gesture for product images on mobile

Step 2: Verify product images are in swipeable carousel
Step 3: Swipe left on image
Step 4: Confirm image advances to next
Step 5: Swipe right
Step 6: Verify image goes back to previous

description: Voice search functionality on mobile (mock)
steps: Step 1: View site on mobile
Step 2: Click microphone icon in search bar
Step 3: Verify voice input is activated (mock)
Step 4: Speak or simulate voice input
Step 5: Confirm search query is populated
Step 6: Verify search executes with voice query

description: Session timeout logs user out after inactivity

Step 2: Note the session timeout duration
Step 3: Wait for timeout period without activity
Step 4: Attempt to access protected page
Step 5: Verify redirect to login page
Step 6: Confirm session expired message is shown

description: Refresh token extends user session
steps: Step 1: Login and obtain initial JWT token
Step 2: Note access token expiry time
Step 3: Make API request near token expiry
Step 4: Verify refresh token is used to get new access token
Step 5: Confirm user session continues without re-login
Step 6: Check that new token is stored

description: Rate limiting protects API endpoints
steps: Step 1: Make rapid successive API requests to same endpoint
Step 2: Verify rate limit is enforced after threshold
Step 3: Check for 429 Too Many Requests status code
Step 4: Confirm error message indicates rate limit
Step 5: Wait for rate limit window to reset
Step 6: Verify requests are allowed again

description: CORS headers allow frontend access to API
steps: Step 1: Make API request from frontend
Step 2: Check browser console for CORS errors
Step 3: Verify Access-Control-Allow-Origin header is present
Step 4: Confirm preflight OPTIONS requests succeed
Step 5: Verify credentials can be included if needed

description: Product search handles special characters
steps: Step 1: Navigate to search
Step 2: Enter search with special characters (e.g., 'men's shirt')
Step 3: Verify search executes without error
Step 4: Check that results are returned correctly
Step 5: Confirm special characters don't break query

description: Product prices display with correct currency formatting
steps: Step 1: View products on listing page
Step 2: Verify prices show currency symbol (e.g., $)
Step 3: Check that prices have two decimal places
Step 4: Confirm thousand separators if applicable

description: Tax calculation in checkout is accurate
steps: Step 1: Add products to cart
Step 2: Proceed to checkout
Step 3: Enter shipping address in taxable region
Step 4: Verify tax is calculated based on address
Step 5: Check that tax rate is appropriate for region
Step 6: Confirm tax amount is added to total correctly

description: Minimum order amount for promo code is enforced

Step 2: Add products to cart below minimum
Step 3: Attempt to apply promo code
Step 4: Verify error message about minimum not met
Step 5: Add more products to exceed minimum
Step 6: Apply promo code again
Step 7: Confirm code is accepted

description: Promo code usage limit is enforced
steps: Step 1: Create promo code with max_uses limit
Step 2: Apply code to orders until limit is reached
Step 3: Attempt to use code after limit reached
Step 4: Verify error message that code is no longer valid
Step 5: Check database that current_uses equals max_uses

description: Expired promo codes cannot be applied
steps: Step 1: Create promo code with past end_date
Step 2: Attempt to apply code at checkout
Step 3: Verify error message about code being expired
Step 4: Confirm no discount is applied
Step 5: Check that code with future start_date also cannot be used yet

description: Order number is unique for each order
steps: Step 1: Place first order and note order number
Step 2: Place second order
Step 3: Verify second order has different order number
Step 4: Check database for uniqueness constraint on order_number
Step 5: Confirm order numbers follow consistent format

description: Order items snapshot preserves product details at time of purchase
steps: Step 1: Place order with specific product
Step 2: Check database order_items.product_snapshot
Step 3: Verify product name, price, and image are stored in snapshot
Step 4: Change product price in admin
Step 5: View previous order details
Step 6: Confirm order still shows original price from snapshot

description: Multiple addresses can be saved per user
steps: Step 1: Login and navigate to address book
Step 2: Add first address with label 'Home'
Step 3: Add second address with label 'Work'
Step 4: Add third address with label 'Parents'
Step 5: Verify all three addresses are saved and displayed
Step 6: Check database confirms multiple addresses for user_id

description: Default address is pre-selected at checkout
steps: Step 1: Set an address as default in address book
Step 2: Navigate to checkout
Step 3: Verify default address is pre-filled in form
Step 4: Confirm default address is highlighted in address selection
Step 5: Check that user can still choose different address

description: Breadcrumb navigation shows current location
steps: Step 1: Navigate to a subcategory (e.g., Electronics > Laptops)
Step 2: Verify breadcrumb is displayed at top of page
Step 3: Check that breadcrumb shows Home > Electronics > Laptops
Step 4: Click on 'Electronics' in breadcrumb
Step 5: Verify navigation to Electronics category page
Step 6: Confirm breadcrumb updates to Home > Electronics

description: 404 page displays for non-existent routes
steps: Step 1: Navigate to invalid URL (e.g., /nonexistent-page)
Step 2: Verify 404 page is displayed
Step 3: Check that page explains content not found
Step 4: Confirm navigation links to return to homepage
Step 5: Verify search is available to find content

description: Product URL slugs are SEO-friendly
steps: Step 1: Navigate to product detail page
Step 2: Check URL format
Step 3: Verify URL uses slug format (e.g., /products/blue-cotton-shirt)
Step 4: Confirm slug is lowercase with hyphens
Step 5: Verify slug is derived from product name
Step 6: Check that product is accessible via slug URL

description: Category URL slugs are SEO-friendly
steps: Step 1: Navigate to category page
Step 2: Check URL format
Step 3: Verify URL uses slug format (e.g., /categories/mens-clothing)
Step 4: Confirm slug is lowercase with hyphens
Step 5: Verify category is accessible via slug URL

description: Brand pages display all products from brand
steps: Step 1: Click on a brand link or filter
Step 2: Navigate to brand page
Step 3: Verify brand name and logo are displayed
Step 4: Check that all products from brand are shown
Step 5: Confirm product count matches brand filter
Step 6: Verify brand description is displayed

description: Filters sidebar is collapsible on desktop
steps: Step 1: Navigate to products page on desktop
Step 2: Verify filters sidebar is visible by default
Step 3: Click collapse/hide filters button
Step 4: Confirm sidebar collapses and more space for products
Step 5: Click show filters button
Step 6: Verify sidebar expands again

description: Mobile filter menu opens as modal or drawer
steps: Step 1: View products page on mobile width
Step 2: Verify filters are hidden by default
Step 3: Click 'Filters' button
Step 4: Confirm filters open in modal or drawer
Step 5: Apply filters
Step 6: Close filter panel
Step 7: Verify filters are applied to products
